ModMetaData.name: Grenades N'at Food Fight
ModMetaData.author: bblkepling
ModMetaData.description:
Makes some food item useable as throwable weapons. This is a stand alone mod in the GNAT series.
Includes Combat Extended Support
Patched: Vanilla -Potatoes -Corn
Vanilla Plants Expanded -Apples -Cabbage -Eggplants -Onions -Oranges -Pears -Prickly Pears -Pumpkins -Tomatoes
